title: OMFG so many scripters !!!!!
body: in this last week i have seen about 1 a game some games we get groups of them 2 and 3 of them its insane, you can't hit them and if you do manage to land a skill shot its only because they were draped by 2-3 skill shots but hell most of the time they dance just our of range of any skill shot you do have hahah. i don't think i have ever seen it this bad. might be because I'm playing on a low level account.
